name: After the Battle, Rimuru
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 level 1 or lower character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's level 0 or lower characters, and return it to his or her hand.

name: After the Battle, Rimuru
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 level 1 or lower character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's level 0 or lower characters, and return it to his or her hand.

name: Successor, Rimuru
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【ACT】 effect of "Inherited Wishes, Rimuru", look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(2)] When this card attacks, if "Meguru Mono" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 2 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)【ACT】 Memory [(1) 【REST】 1 of your characters] If ""Conqueror of Flames" Shizu" is in your memory, choose up to 1 "Successor, Rimuru" or ""Predator" Rimuru" in your hand, put it on any position of your stage, and put all markers underneath this card face down in any order underneath that character as markers.

If you do, put the top card of your clock into your stock.

X is equal to the number of other 《Demon Continent》 characters you have ×500.

name: Feeling of Respect, Eren
text: 【AUTO】 When your character's trigger check reveals a climax, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, perform the following action. "Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room."

If you do, 【REST】 this card.

name: New Power
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the  effect.(: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as 【REST】)

text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the  effect.(: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as 【REST】)

name: Awoken Impulse
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 red card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Head of the Monsters, Rimuru
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Demon Continent》 characters, this card gets +1000 power.【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 level 1 or higher card from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0)

name: Head of the Monsters, Rimuru
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Demon Continent》 characters, this card gets +1000 power.【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 level 1 or higher card from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0)

name: "Conqueror of Flames" Shizu
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Legendary Hero" is in your climax area, put 2 cards from the top of your deck into your waiting room, choose up to 1 level X or lower 《Demon Continent》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. X is equal to the total level of cards put into your waiting room by this effect. (Climax are regarded as level 0)【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Demon Continent》 character or "Anti-Magic Mask", you may put this card into your memory. (Return the revealed card to its original place)

name: Request at the Kingdom of Filtwood, Shizu
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, move this card to an open position of your back stage. 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Demon Continent》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Partner Sharing Body and Soul, Rimuru
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your main phase, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room.【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among them, search your deck for up to 1 《Demon Continent》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Partner Sharing Body and Soul, Rimuru
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your main phase, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room.【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among them, search your deck for up to 1 《Demon Continent》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Power to Protect Comrades, Rimuru
text: 【CONT】 The character facing this card cannot move to another position.【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose 1 of your other 《Demon Continent》 characters, 【REST】 it, and move it to an open position of your back stage.

name: "Intimidation" Ranga
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have a 《Demon Continent》 character, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)

name: "Intimidation" Ranga
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have a 《Demon Continent》 character, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)

name: Inherited Wishes, Rimuru
text: 【ACT】 [Put 1 of your other "Last Journey, Shizu" on the stage face down underneath this card as a marker] If your level is 3 or higher, choose up to 1 《Demon Continent》 character in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and use ＄Unique Skill "Predator"＄.【REPLAY】 ＄Unique Skill "Predator"＄ Choose up to 1 "Successor, Rimuru" in your waiting room, put it on the position that this card is on, and put this card and all markers underneath this card face down in any order underneath that "Successor, Rimuru" as markers.

name: Secret Strategy, Rimuru
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Last-Ditch Effort" is in your climax area, you may deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)

text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Unique Skill "Great Sage"" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.

name: Sensible Rigur
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of other 《Demon Continent》 characters you have.

name: All to Oneself, Chloe
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Demon Continent》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Anti-Magic Mask", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Creating Potions! Rimuru
text: 【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Put 1 card from the top of your clock into your waiting room.【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] If there are no markers underneath this card, choose 1 《Demon Continent》 character in your waiting room, and put it face down underneath this card as a marker.【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Put 1 marker underneath this card into your stock.

name: "Spy" Souei
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When your opponent levels up, if "A Trap Laid Out" is in your climax area, and this card is in your center stage, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 《Demon Continent》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and put the rest of the cards into your waiting room.【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is cost 0 or lower, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.

name: "Sticky Steel Thread" Rimuru
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 character in your opponent's back stage with level higher than your opponent's level. That character cannot 【STAND】 during your opponent's next stand phase.【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of souls that character has ×1000.

name: Attendance Check, Rimuru
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock."

name: The One Who Devours All, Rimuru
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each marker underneath this card.【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Demon Continent》 characters, this card gets +2000 power.【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may look at the top card of your deck. If you do, put that card face down underneath this card as a marker.

name: Power of a Hero, Shizu
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 3 or higher characters in front of this card get +2000 power.【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Draw 1 card, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

name: Execution of Duty, Souei
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +2000 power for each of your other "Execution of Duty, Souei" on your center stage.【AUTO】 [(1) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 2 "Execution of Duty, Souei", put them on separate positions on your stage, and shuffle your deck.

name: Into the Midst of Battle, Ranga
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Demon Continent》 characters get +500 power.【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Squaring off Against a Spirit" is placed on your climax area, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Demon Continent》 character, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step." (Return the revealed card to its original place)

name: New Subordinate, Soka
text: 【AUTO】 [Return 2 characters from your waiting room to your deck & Shuffle your deck] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card's soul does not decrease by side attacking until end of turn.【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your 《Demon Continent》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.

name: "Vortex Crash" Gabiru
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put 4 cards from the top of your deck into your waiting room. If "Name Overwritten, Gabiru" is revealed among those cards, you may return this card to your hand.

name: Clone, Souei
text: 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] Search your deck for up to 1 "Clone, Souei", put it on any position of your stage, shuffle your deck, and at the end of the turn, put that character into your waiting room.

name: Desperate Battle, Gobta
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, all players reveal the top card of their deck. Of the cards revealed by this effect, if your card has level higher than your opponent's  card, choose 1 "Weapons Made in Tempest" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. If your card has level lower than your opponent's card, choose 1 "Shion's Home Cooking" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)

name: Name Overwritten, Gabiru
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put 5 cards from the top of your deck into your waiting room. If "Name Overwritten, Gabiru" is revealed among those cards, you may return this card to your hand.

name: Chloe & Alice & Kenya & Ryota & Gale
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 4 or more cards in your hand, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn.

name: A Break at the Hot Springs, Rimuru
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Demon Continent》 characters.【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Demon Continent》 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into the waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as @REST)

name: "Rigurd Shock" Rigurd
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.

name: "Shadow Movement" Ranga
text: 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put this card into your memory. If you do, at the beginning of your next draw phase, choose 1 ""Shadow Movement" Ranga" in your memory, and put it on any position on your stage.

name: Anti-Magic Mask

If you do, return this card to your hand.
